import axios from"axios";// Export an object containing methods we'll use for accessing the random user API
export default{fetchUsers:function fetchUsers(){return axios.get("https://api.github.com/orgs/github/public_members").then(function(res){var users=res.data;return users.map(function(user){return{login:user.login,image:user.avatar_url,profileUrl:user.html_url};});});}};
